alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fremont County through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Howard, or 14 miles north of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Howard around 645 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Coaldale and Cotopaxi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft
